name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HolliTube: YouTube Subtitles, Words for Language Learning, Translator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn languages effortlessly on YouTube. Enjoy clean captions, instant translations, and easy vocabulary building.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn YouTube into your personalized language learning gym with Holli Tube!   Learn languages through the content you love while boosting your listening comprehension, vocabulary, and reading skills.

#  Enhanced Captions & Subtitles
Choose from 3 themes (SMALL, IMPACT, FULL) for optimal viewing in any video scene.

# Seamless Translation
Click on any caption word for instant translations, enriching your understanding.

# Blind Watching
Sharpen your listening skills by blurring captions that reappear when paused.

# Personalized Vocabulary Builder
Translated words automatically sync with My Words on holli.cc for convenient review and memorization.

# Quick Controls
Control the video playing by hotkeys:
- Navigate subtitles with ease (< and > keys).
- Adjust playback speed ( - and + keys).
- Toggle blurred captions (B key).
- Switch caption themes on the fly (Shift key).

# Supports learning in the following languages:
- English
- Deutsch
- Français
- Español
- Português
- Русский
- 日本語
- 한국어

We're always improving! Your feedback helps us shape the future of Holli Tube.
